S

Section - Class in it.azraelsec.Document
The Section class represents a Document section and contains a portion of the document's itself.
send(DataOutputStream, DataInputStream, Handler, Handler, Commands, Object...) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Protocol.Communication
Requests a Commands execution and waits to receive its result back.
send(Commands, String) - Method in interface it.azraelsec.Protocol.Result
Sends back a Commands and a result String to the requester.
sendAndReceiveStream(DataOutputStream, DataInputStream, Handler, OutputStream, Handler, Commands, Object...) - Static method in class it.azraelsec.Protocol.Communication
It sends a Commands which represents the action We would like to request and waits for a resulting data stream.
sendMessage(ChatMessage, InetSocketAddress) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Chat.MessageSender
It formats the data into the buffer that will be streamed in a way that the other MessageReceiver can interpret.
Server - Class in it.azraelsec.Server
The Server class represents the process that serves the Client connection and spawn new TCPConnectionDispatcher threads to handler them.
Server() - Constructor for class it.azraelsec.Server.Server
Initializes the Server.
setNewGroup(long) - Method in class it.azraelsec.Chat.MessageReceiver
It makes the MessageReceiver to listen for messages coming from the group represented by the IPv4 address in decimal format.
